fl: pronoun, singular or plural in construction

dt: used without a following noun as a pronoun equivalent in meaning to the adjective {it}their{/it}
used with an indefinite third person singular antecedent

dt.t: I will do my part if everybody else will do {wi}theirs{/wi}

shortdef: that which belongs to them —used without a following noun as a pronoun equivalent in meaning to the adjective their
his or hers : his, hers —used with an indefinite third person singular antecedent
